hero.title: Automatically detect critical web accessibility issues
hero.description: Identify critical issues with keyboard and focus, contrast, images/alt text, reflow and more, with visual evidence and practical recommendations for remediation.

features.title: What is A11i Detector?
features.description: A11i Detector is an automated web accessibility analysis tool that helps technical and business teams detect more than 70% of the most common accessibility problems that directly impact user experience and regulatory compliance.

items.title: Automated analysis
items.description: Detects more than 70% of the most common accessibility problems

items.title: Visual evidence
items.description: Each issue includes screenshots and exact location on the page

items.title: Regulatory compliance
items.description: Aligned with WCAG and European Accessibility Law

features.functionality: It works through a browser extension and a centralized Dashboard, allowing you to run tests on specific URLs or sections, review historical results and manage detected issues in a structured way.
features.compliance: A11i Detector is aligned with WCAG guidelines and the EN 301 549 standard, supporting compliance with the European Accessibility Act (EAA).
